kpi.name: M1022C69

kpi_info.title: DELAY BUILDUP INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO IUB DELAY
kpi_info.use: The number of "Congestion Indication control frame - delay build-up" sent to BTS due to Iub delay detected by Frame protocol. When the RNC Frame Protocol entity sends "Congestion Indication control frame - delay build-up" indication to the base station and the indication was triggered by congestion detected by Frame Protocol entity.

kpi.kpi_alias: DELAY BUILDUP INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO IUB DELAY
